680:1: athakhalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
680:2: śṛṇu tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ ! pañcamamudrāpaṭalavisaraṃ tvadīyaṃ sarvatathāgatadharmakośānupraviṣṭaṃ paramaguhyatamaṃ dharmadhātvasaṃkhyeyācintyamudrāmudritaṃ sarvamantracaryānupraviṣṭaṃ paramarahasyatamaṃ sarvalokottarotkṛṣṭatamaṃ sarvalaukikānucaritāṃ modyatamaṃ katamaṃ ca tad bhāṣiṣye'ham |
680:4: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi utthāyāsanād bhagavataḥ caraṇayornipatya bhagavantametadavocat |
680:5: tat sādhu bhagavāṃ deśayatu sarvamantracaryānupraviṣṭāṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya asmākaṃ cānukampāmupādāya mahāpraṇidhānamahānirhāramahābodhimaṇḍopasaṅkramaṇacaryāparipūraṇatāya pañcamaṃ mahāmudrāpaṭalavisaraṃ saṃkṣepataḥ pañca caiva mahāmudrāḥ |
680:6: aparyantā ca sthitamudrāṃ āhvānanavisarjanasarvakarmārthasarvamanorathamāśāpāripūraṇatāyai sarvamantratantramahāmudrānupraveśanatāyai sarvasattvasantoṣaṇamahāsamayasarvamudrānupraveśanatāyai yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyaśceti ||
680:12: dṛṣṭvā āgatāṃ sattvā vavre vāṇī ṛṣisattamaḥ ||
680:13: śākyakulajo dakṣaḥ mudrāṃ deśe tu tatkṣaṇāt |
680:14: yaṃ baddhvā puruṣā prājñā niyataṃ bodhiparāyaṇāḥ ||
680:15: sarvamantrāśca siddheyu saugatā ye ca laukikā |
680:16: pañca caiva mahāmudrā baddhā munivaraiḥ purā ||
680:20: kanyasau saṃsparśayed dhīmāṃ ubhā aṅguṣṭha ucchraye ||
680:23: sarvathā sādhitā devī pūrṇeti ca gīyate |
680:24: tadeva hastau bhrāmayitvā tu nābhideśe tu saṃnyaset ||
680:25: āśāsampādinī kṣipraṃ mahāpuṇyā hitā hi sā |
680:28: uraḥ sthāne sadā nyasyā tṛtīyā bhavati sunirmalā ||
680:29: caturthī tu bhavet sā tu śiraḥsthāne sumudrayā |
680:30: pañcamī tu bhave jyeṣṭhā muktā sarvagatāṃ nu guṇān ||
680:31: lokadhātrī tu sā jñeyā prasiddhā sarvakarmasu |
680:34: vikṣiptairvisarjanaṃ kuryāt manasā mokṣa eva tu ||
680:36: āryamañjuśriyamūlakalpāt bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakāt mahāyānavaipulyasūtrāt catuḥcatvāriṃśatimaḥ mahāmudrāpaṭalavisaraḥ parisamāpta iti |
